name: Deluxe Denver Omelet
description: Enjoy pillowy eggs stuffed with ham, sweet bell pepper, and a dusting of cheese, chive, and vegetarian bacon (hello, CCB Dip Mix). What takes this over the top is the lush drizzle of hollandaise sauce that’s made in the microwave. Yes, that’s right—the microwave.
preparation: In a small bowl, whisk eggs, milk, and dip mix until frothy. Stir in diced ham and pepper.
Pour into lightly oiled Omelet Maker. Close lid and microwave on high 2–3 min, or until omelet is set.
Loosen omelet with spatula and carefully transfer onto plate. Top with prepared sauce and black pepper, if desired.
tips: Prepare Hollandaise Sauce the night before. Reheat in the microwave until warm, whisking every 30 seconds.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup roasted potatoes and 1 cup chopped veggies.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.

products.name: Hollandaise Sauce Mix (3pk)
summary: A healthier & lighter alternative to hollandaise sauce—skip the mess & complicated steps with this no-fail recipe.
